S.FORM: Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa ryax sa tay 28 nqu tay 1, Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa, squliq na sezi'. (minhtuw sa kawas tay 1950) mrhuw Bahrain ta' misuw hya' ga Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa, aring ryax tay 6 squ byacing tay 3 sa kawas 1999 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
